title: Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.09.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Suicide Squad has been delayed according to Jason Schreier! Blessing and Janet break it down along with Mario Kart character teases, and anime characters coming to Fortnite.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:03 - Housekeeping
There’s a big sale on the Kinda Funny store! Buy one get one free with code KFBOGO over on kindafunny.com/store.
This Friday is March 10th, so you know what that means: It's MARIO DAY! I’m teaming up with Retro Queen AshSaidHi to bring you a Super Mario Celebration. This Friday, March 10th on twitch.tv/twitch at 11am PT to celebrate everyone's favorite plumber / kart racer / athlete / doctor / painter / janitor, you get the idea! It's MARIO!
The Roper Report   -
00:09:43 - Mario Kart 8 Deluxe May Be Getting Five More Characters in Future DLC Waves
00:29:33 - Epic Games Store Launches Self-Publishing Tools For Developers
00:31:53 - Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League Delayed Again
00:45:21 - Jim Ryan wants just one thing and it’s disgusting
00:48:55 - A Resident Evil 4 remake demo is seemingly coming today
00:52:20 - It’s official: Eren Jaeger from Attack on Titan is hitting Fortnite next season
00:57:33 - Out today
01:00:08 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

was rolling out new self-publishing tools that will allow game developers and Publishers to release their games on his PC digital storefront in a new press release epic games confirmed that there are some guidelines developers and Publishers must follow to utilize these tools some noteworthy requirements include that games offer PC cross-play support across all PC stores for multiplayer titles and include age ratings for regional distribution one of the more interesting requirements notes that games that launch on other PC platforms like steam that include support for achievements must also enable epic game store achievements epic games knows this quote helps standardize the player experience regardless of where the game was purchased end quote one incentive for developers to sell their game through the epic game store epic games storefront is the revenue share in which epic takes a 12 percent Edition on game sales while developers slash Publishers keep 88 developers can also choose
